attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many foreign imports are wiping out Britain's manufacturing industry, cutting jobs and losing money. Please sign below to encourage the government to encourage people to buy British.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Launch a 'buy British' campaign."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14745.asp

Prime Minister's Office
